data.lyric:

[00:00.00]WHAT'S GOOD (Explicit) - Tyler, The Creator
[00:03.09]Lyrics by：Tyler Okonma
[00:06.18]Composed by：Tyler Okonma
[00:09.27]Turn my lights on
[00:10.42]How the f**k you quiet with the mic on
[00:12.33]I don't get anxiety you Sam Bowie-ass n***as
[00:14.78]I just get my Mike on
[00:16.23]Y'all said I wouldn't go nowhere took the detour
[00:18.56]When you see the someone in the crack right by the sea shore
[00:20.62]When you see them brand new le Fleurs on the floor
[00:22.65]If the cop says my name b***h I'm Igor
[00:26.59]Yuh ayo
[00:30.56]Yeah yeah
[00:32.39]Let's go let's go I ain't playin' around
[00:34.54]Red nose red nose all you n***as is clowns
[00:36.59]N***as turning it up well shit I'm tearing it down
[00:38.46]Hard to believe in God when there ain't no mirrors around
[00:40.38]What's up
[00:42.65]Uh-huh ayo
[00:46.79]Uh-huh
[00:48.84]Yeah yo
[00:52.97]B***h
[00:53.49]Running 'til the rims fall
[00:54.60]Had them n***as and the cops looking jigsaw
[00:56.87]I done f**ked around and turned into the big dog
[00:58.69]Better get gone get caught b***h I think not
[01:00.81]Yeah new suit new boots same n***as like what
[01:03.41]Lukewarm-ass n***as always wanna talk
[01:05.90]I'm hot I'm heat to the core like Earth
[01:07.51]Don't touch don't go n***as might get bucked
[01:11.39]Yo yuh ayo
[01:16.93]Yeah
[01:17.33]Let's go let's go I ain't playin' around
[01:19.43]Red nose red nose all you n***as is clowns
[01:21.48]N***as turning it up well s**t I'm tearing it down
[01:23.18]Hard to believe in God when there ain't no mirrors around
[01:25.36]What's up
[01:27.56]Whoop uh huh
[01:31.61]Yeah b***h
[01:41.65]I see the light
[01:42.71]Now didn't I tell you motherf**kers
[01:44.60]Um I see the light
[01:46.33]To pay attention and to keep your motherf**king eyes
[01:49.05]Glued to the man that's in front of you
[01:50.48]I see the light
[01:51.12]That's what the f**k I expect all y'all motherf**kers to do
[01:53.32]I see the light
[01:54.43]Dracula Dracula Dracula
[01:56.62]Suck me first I might get back at ya
[01:58.02]I see the light
[01:58.75]Is that shit cool Change the aperture
[02:00.16]Hahahahaha I can't laugh at ya
[02:01.98]I see the light
[02:02.59]This the s**t that make you nervous
[02:04.41]'Bout to go buck wild n***a Steve Irwin
[02:05.92]I see the light
[02:06.59]Sick of that Claritin I'm on my third one
[02:08.16]N***as talkin' reckless I never heard 'em
[02:09.66]I see the light
[02:14.10]I see the light
[02:18.10]I see the light
[02:18.85]F**ked up touched up my n***as might get f**ked up touched up
[02:22.07]I see the light
[02:23.12]F**ked up touched up my n***as might get f**ked up touched up
[02:26.20]I see the light
[02:27.28]That car crash couldn't take me
[02:28.64]Woo ha
[02:29.13]Green hair angels all around me
[02:30.61]Uh
[02:31.11]No answer why no tears to cry b***h I'm alive
[02:33.87]I see the
[02:35.25]This wasn't my endpoint like v-neck
[02:37.05]I ain't have nobody to cheat on I cheat death
[02:39.15]New album no repeat I reset
[02:41.00]Everything I deliver swingin' like new jack
[02:42.83]Two of 'em I total Kim and Pam
[02:45.32]Me and Death universe plays middle man
[02:47.28]Quit nap kick back my eyes closed shut
[02:49.38]Loud sound no stretch
[02:50.37]Motherf**kers really thought I died
[02:52.28]Hoping they could take a spot
[02:53.42]N***a not knowing that I'm one of one
[02:55.38]And they some Helen Keller-ass n***as
[02:56.89]And I got my eyes open now I see the light
[03:03.05]I see the light
[03:03.98]You never wanna meet a motherf**ker like me
[03:06.94]I see the light
[03:07.59]I said
[03:11.12]I see the light
[03:15.17]I see the light
[03:22.46]I don't know what's harder letting go or just being okay with it
data.trans:
[ti:WHAT'S GOOD (Explicit)]
[ar:Tyler, The Creator]
[al:IGOR (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.09]//
[00:06.18]//
[00:09.27]舞台灯光亮起
[00:10.42]麦克风已经开启 你怎么还一言不发
[00:12.33]我没有得焦虑症 你们就像球员Sam Bowie一样伤病缠身
[00:14.78]我拿起麦克风
[00:16.23]你们都说我会一事无成 但我另辟蹊径
[00:18.56]你见过哪个穷人会去海边度假吗
[00:20.62]你见过谁穿着Golf le Fleurs的鞋子踩在地上吗
[00:22.65]警察喊我的名字 我头也不回
[00:26.59]//
[00:30.56]//
[00:32.39]走吧 走吧 我不喜欢四处招摇
[00:34.54]你们都是涂着红鼻子的小丑
[00:36.59]你们的音乐只是小打小闹 而我的音乐震耳欲聋
[00:38.46]我只相信镜子里的我 我才是真正的上帝
[00:40.38]怎么了
[00:42.65]//
[00:46.79]//
[00:48.84]//
[00:52.97]碧池
[00:53.49]一路飞驰 直到车子报废
[00:54.60]我的对手们和那些警察都很困惑 他们摸不清我的套路
[00:56.87]我四处奔忙 成为了音乐界的大人物
[00:58.69]你叫我快点跑 别被抓了 碧池 这不可能
[01:00.81]穿着新衣服 新鞋子 但我还是原来的我
[01:03.41]那些从前对我冷淡的人现在又想和我搭讪
[01:05.90]我现在火了 火遍全世界
[01:07.51]别碰我 别轻举妄动 小心我揍你
[01:11.39]//
[01:16.93]//
[01:17.33]走吧 走吧 我不喜欢四处招摇
[01:19.43]你们都是涂着红鼻子的小丑
[01:21.48]你们的音乐只是小打小闹 而我的音乐震耳欲聋
[01:23.18]我只相信镜子里的我 我才是真正的上帝
[01:25.36]怎么了
[01:27.56]//
[01:31.61]碧池
[01:41.65]我看见了希望
[01:42.71]我没跟你说吗 小子
[01:44.60]我看见了希望
[01:46.33]都给我集中注意 眼珠子别乱动
[01:49.05]盯紧你眼前这个人
[01:50.48]我看见了希望
[01:51.12]我希望你们都能按我说的做
[01:53.32]我看见了希望
[01:54.43]吸血鬼Count Dracula
[01:56.62]是你先吸了我的血 我会报仇的
[01:58.02]我看见了希望
[01:58.75]这样酷吗 睁开眼睛
[02:00.16]我不能嘲笑你
[02:01.98]我看见了希望
[02:02.59]这才是让你紧张的原因吧
[02:04.41]我要彻底变得疯狂了
[02:05.92]我看见了希望
[02:06.59]讨厌吃过敏药 我已经吃了三次了
[02:08.16]那些人说话不过脑子 我从来不放在心上
[02:09.66]我看见了希望
[02:14.10]我看见了希望
[02:18.10]我看见了希望
[02:18.85]别乱动 否则休怪我对你不客气
[02:22.07]我看见了希望
[02:23.12]别乱动 否则休怪我对你不客气
[02:26.20]我看见了希望
[02:27.28]一场车祸不可能要了我的命
[02:28.64]//
[02:29.13]天使一直庇佑着我
[02:30.61]//
[02:31.11]不想解释太多 我不会流泪 碧池 我还活着
[02:33.87]我看见
[02:35.25]我的人生不会就此终结
[02:37.05]我不会欺骗任何人 我和死神捉迷藏
[02:39.15]新专辑 没有重制的歌曲 我从头开始
[02:41.00]我的每一个作品都是受人欢迎的佳作
[02:42.83]我的实力一个顶俩 堪比Total组合的Kima Dyson和Pam Long
[02:45.32]我和死神中间隔了一个宇宙
[02:47.28]别再打盹了 我闭着眼睛也能收拾你们
[02:49.38]声音大雨点小
[02:50.37]他们还以为我真的死了
[02:52.28]希望他们不会输得太惨
[02:53.42]他们不知道 我是独一无二的
[02:55.38]他们对眼前的机会视而不见
[02:56.89]而我睁大双眼 我看见了希望
[03:03.05]我看见了希望
[03:03.98]你们都不想碰到我这样的高手
[03:06.94]我看见了希望
[03:07.59]我说
[03:11.12]我看见了希望
[03:15.17]我看见了希望
[03:22.46]我不知道放手和接受哪个更难
